title: Nekogami Yaoyorozu (The Everyday Tales of a Cat God)
synopsis: Koyama Yuzu is running an antique shop. Mayu, a cat god (nekogami), is living off Yuzu and leads an idle life playing games. Lots of other gods visit Mayu and enjoy merrymaking.
related_anime: ['Nekogami Yaoyorozu Specials', 'Nekogami Yaoyorozu: Ohanami Ghostbusters', 'Nekogami Yaoyorozu']
